mapper.select: select g.goods_no goodsNo, g.goods_title goodsTitle, g.goods_memo goodsMemo, g.goods_state goodsState, c.category_title categoryTitle, gf.goods_file_name goodsFileName, gf.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt from goods g inner join goods_category gc on g.goods_no = gc.goods_no inner join category c on gc.category_no = c.category_no inner join goods_file gf on g.goods_no = gf.goods_no where g.goods_no = #{goodsNo}
